Author: Allison
EnhancedContent:
Enterprise administrators can now request and download billing usage reports in `.csv` format via a new REST API. With this new capability, the same [billing reports](https://docs.github.com/enterprise-cloud@latest/billing/reference/billing-reports#report-types) that are available in the UI can now be programmatically created.

For details on how to use the new endpoints and to provide feedback, refer to the [GitHub Community discussion](https://github.com/orgs/community/discussions/186162).

Title: API access to billing usage reports in public preview
